Text:
I am no longer uploading to demonoid, so don't ask me to. If you have an idea of a suitable backup board for Rush torrents let me know. 

As for why? The selective application of comment moderation became untenable. 

Long live the consistency of thepiratebay!

Thanks again!!


What's funny is that I got "moderated" for a comment replying to your ROFL MAO post!!!

Fuck demonoid!

I responded to a troll, I was moderated and my comment removed, and then given a warning. The troll post was deleted with no warning. 

Two other people were given warnings for basically telling trolls to piss off. Never were the trolls warned.
Always wondered what Nixon did during his down time in China.
demonian has lost for some reason the audio book market, nothing much but muslim stuff there now. thanks for these limbaugh loads. regards j

funny you mention that charlie, if you say one thing negative about islam you get banned from ever commenting. I am on a message board where three people had that happen at demonoid. They can log on & download, but they can't post comments.

Something pretty screwy about that site.

As a backup can you try extratorrent dot com ?
Another option is torrentday dot com

Thanks kindly for another great week of podcasts! Much appreciated!

Re: Demonium - stop and think for a moment: lots of islam stuff - and someone posts something negative about islam (and the poster gets banned), logic says the mods over there are (wait for it...) moslem!

And so when some moslem make a truly ignorant comment about christianity, I commented on islam and one of the mods sent a personal poison pen note to my inbox threatening all sorts of shite... *shrug*

would anyone know of a good, dependable place (other than here) where one can get a good selection of audio books? 

Have a good, and safe, weekend all! :)

I had a comment regarding the topic on hand but the damn thing didn't post! *ahem*

Anyway - hope you see my Thank You here for another great week of Rush's podcasts!

Have a safe weekend!
It posted after all. Bloody hell. Anyone else have posts that either don't show up at all or show up later?
I am looking at T0RRENTB0X. It is hardly used and should be perfect for us.

Hey - you guys should join in the fun at Weasel Zippers (www.weaselzippers.us)

Mark Levin gave them a "Hat Tip" once or twice and I checked them out.

I post as "woz" over there.
Many thanks Annoyme, have a safe weekend.
